vpsissIpipeCfaConfig Struct Reference

Structure containing CFA configuration, CFA module is used for converting Bayer format to RGB format. It also does digital anti-aliasing to improve the output quality. More...

Detailed Description

Structure containing CFA configuration, CFA module is used for converting Bayer format to RGB format. It also does digital anti-aliasing to improve the output quality.

struct vpsissIpipeCfaConfig

Field Documentation
